Articles.Content:
I have installed the sub assembly mod and im looking for a heavy lifter design. It needs to be simple and effective. Any replies are greatly appreciated.

Thank you, pucadan

Heavy lifter's kind of vague...what's the mass of your payload?

Are you looking for one to build yourself or are you just wanting one someone else has already built?

I'm on my phone right now, it's 9 a.m. so I'll be bussy for a while. But after lunch I'll post some pictures of my standard Kw Rocketry lifters. That mod is awesome for lifter designs.

But, could you tell us how heavy is your payload?

KW Rocketry is geat, but you can have fun and launch heavy playload with the stock part.

If you whant a lifter efficient, you need a desing named asparagus.

Temstar made a nice post on this, see http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24787-0-19-1-Zenith-rocket-family
